text:
Small space with a few seats and meeting rooms to rest and have a complimentary coffee with Patchi chocolate as you take a break from shopping

edit: L1 gonna close from 12 May 2025 to Sep 2025, and will be moved to L6 near Adeva Spa

Cosy lounge situated near the Metro end of the mall provided by Paragon for Prestige and Pinnacle members, a pretty nice place to relax and rest after running errands and shopping. You can enjoy some coffee/tea as well as make use of their meeting room facilities for more privacy, simply scan your Paragon membership code on the app to enter the lounge.
Prestige member can get free entry +1 and free drink to rest after long shopping

This lounge is located on the ground floor inside Paragon shopping mall, and it offers a comfortable place to conduct business or to relax for Prestige and Pinnacle members.

There are concierge services and a selection of beverages available. Users can also book one of several private cubicles.

Absolutely awful and appalling customer service. Redeemed a box of chocolates under Paragon Club only to find there were 2 missing pieces inside. The only response provided by Paragon concierge is that this is my own fault for not checking carefully when I received the chocolates!

The lack of accountability and snobbery in the way you handle this trivial matter shows the kind of business you are. This is the first and last time I am shopping at this mall.
